title: Replay/highlight link?
body: I need to report a bug. and I have a replay downloaded, but can't do anything with the file, and a highlight I can view. How can I attach it to a report a bug page?

replies.body: You won't be able to attach a video I don't believe, but you could use something like Gyazo or Imgur to paste a screenshot here. If you need the video to really understand the bug that's happening to you, then you could upload the video elsewhere, like youtube, and then just send us a link to the video!
